metadata.title: CVE-2015-7717 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: mediaserver in Android 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY48T and 6.0 before 2015-10-01allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internalbug 19573085, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-6596.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
